posts.post_content:
I am hoping for a bit of fun with this one.  What are you willing to trade for this or offer in $?  Ridiculous public offers (both high and low) encouraged ;-)

Mac

With the printing flaws of missing the letters "ie" in series and whatever is going on in the B in Bear I will offer $10. I actually think that is too much seeing I can get one without those flaws for $25 in that condition.;):rolleyes::D
I'll go $20 and a Billy Ripken F*** Face error!! :D
I'll offer $500. No joke real offer.
Okay, now I really will run to the bank and sort through my cards.  :eek:

I've received an offer I couldn't refuse ;-)

Lots of interesting discussions on the card...but it should have a new home soon.

Thanks everyone!

Mac

[quote name="obcmac" post=1394957]I've received an offer I couldn't refuse ;-)

Lots of interesting discussions on the card...but it should have a new home soon.

Thanks everyone!

Mac[/QUOTE]

I can't blame you for accepting the 89 Fleer Bill Ripken F*ck Face error after all it is the most famous error ever.;):D
